name: Reservation Management
description: Handles the complete reservation lifecycle including table booking, assignment, and availability tracking for both walk-ins and online bookings. Includes customer-facing booking interface and staff-facing table management tools.

name: Order Processing
description: Encompasses all ordering workflows including in-restaurant orders, online orders, menu management, and order status tracking. Manages digital menu customization and real-time order monitoring for both staff and customers.

name: Staff Operations
description: Controls all staff-related functions including shift scheduling, role assignments, and workforce management. Provides tools for creating and managing staff schedules while ensuring appropriate coverage for all operational hours.

name: Customer Engagement
description: Manages the customer-facing components including the online booking interface, order tracking system, and digital menu access. Ensures a seamless experience for customers interacting with the restaurant through digital channels.

name: Restaurant Administration
description: Provides core administrative functions for restaurant management including system configuration, user access control, and operational settings. Serves as the central hub for managing restaurant-wide parameters and policies.
